message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $90. It's in excellent condition and worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the condition of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending under $80. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $75?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $75 is just a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $85. It's still a fair price considering the condition of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
